001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.http;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PersistencePort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageMetadata;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.TransactionId;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.io.BlobWriter;
012import java.io.BufferedWriter;
013import java.io.IOException;
014import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
015import java.nio.file.Files;
016import java.nio.file.Path;
017import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
018import java.time.Instant;
019import java.time.ZoneId;
020import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
021import java.util.Map;
022
023/**
024 * Writes HTTP message pairs in the legacy SegmentSink blob/index format.
025 * <p>Synchronizes writes to append request/response payloads to a shared blob and emits matching
026 * index entries. Optionally delegates non-HTTP pairs to another {@link PersistencePort}.</p>
027 *
028 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
029 */
030public final class HttpSegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter implements PersistencePort {
031  private static final DateTimeFormatter STAMP =
032      DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("uuuuMMdd-HHmmss").withZone(ZoneId.systemDefault());
033
034  private final BlobWriter blob;
035  private final BufferedWriter index;
036  private final String blobName;
037  private final String indexName;
038  private final PersistencePort fallback;
039
040  /**
041   * Creates an HTTP segment sink without a fallback.
042   *
043   * @param directory output directory for blob/index files
044   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
045   */
046  public HttpSegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(Path directory) {
047    this(directory, null);
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Creates an HTTP segment sink with an optional fallback for non-HTTP pairs.
052   *
053   * @param directory output directory for blob/index files
054   * @param fallback optional persistence fallback for other protocols
055   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
056   */
057  public HttpSegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(Path directory, PersistencePort fallback) {
058    try {
059      Files.createDirectories(directory);
060      String stamp = STAMP.format(Instant.now());
061      this.blobName = "blob-" + stamp + ".seg";
062      this.indexName = "index-" + stamp + ".ndjson";
063      this.blob = new BlobWriter(directory.resolve(blobName));
064      this.index = Files.newBufferedWriter(
065          directory.resolve(indexName),
066          StandardCharsets.UTF_8,
067          StandardOpenOption.CREATE,
068          StandardOpenOption.APPEND);
069      this.fallback = fallback;
070    } catch (IOException e) {
071      throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to initialize HTTP segment sink", e);
072    }
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Writes HTTP request/response payloads to disk, delegating other protocols to the fallback.
077   *
078   * @param pair message pair to persist; {@code null} is ignored
079   * @throws Exception if writing fails or the fallback throws
080   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
081   */
082  @Override
083  public synchronized void persist(MessagePair pair) throws Exception {
084    if (pair == null) {
085      return;
086    }
087    boolean handled = false;
088    if (isHttp(pair.request())) {
089      writeEvent(pair.request(), "REQ");
090      handled = true;
091    }
092    if (isHttp(pair.response())) {
093      writeEvent(pair.response(), "RSP");
094      handled = true;
095    }
096    if (!handled && fallback != null) {
097      fallback.persist(pair);
098    }
099  }
100
101  private static boolean isHttp(MessageEvent event) {
102    return event != null && event.protocol() == ProtocolId.HTTP && event.payload() != null;
103  }
104
105  private void writeEvent(MessageEvent event, String kind) throws Exception {
106    ByteStream stream = event.payload();
107    byte[] data = stream.data();
108    int headersEnd = findHeadersEnd(data);
109    int headerLen = headersEnd >= 0 ? headersEnd : data.length;
110    int bodyOffset = headerLen;
111    int bodyLen = Math.max(0, data.length - bodyOffset);
112
113    FiveTuple flow = stream.flow();
114    String src = endpoint(flow, stream.fromClient());
115    String dst = endpoint(flow, !stream.fromClient());
116
117    MessageMetadata metadata = event.metadata() != null ? event.metadata() : MessageMetadata.empty();
118    String transactionId = metadata.transactionId() != null && !metadata.transactionId().isBlank()
119        ? metadata.transactionId()
120        : TransactionId.newId();
121    Map<String, String> attrs = metadata.attributes();
122    String session = attrs != null ? attrs.get("session") : null;
123
124    long headersOffset = blob.position();
125    blob.write(data, 0, headerLen);
126    long headersLength = blob.position() - headersOffset;
127
128    long bodyDiskOffset = blob.position();
129    if (bodyLen > 0) {
130      blob.write(data, bodyOffset, bodyLen);
131    }
132    long bodyLength = blob.position() - bodyDiskOffset;
133
134    String firstLine = extractFirstLine(data, headerLen);
135    String sessionJson = session == null ? "null" : ('"' + escape(session) + '"');
136
137    StringBuilder json = new StringBuilder(192)
138        .append('{')
139        .append("\"ts_first\":").append(stream.timestampMicros()).append(',')
140        .append("\"ts_last\":").append(stream.timestampMicros()).append(',')
141        .append("\"id\":\"").append(escape(transactionId)).append("\",")
142        .append("\"kind\":\"").append(kind).append("\",")
143        .append("\"session\":").append(sessionJson).append(',')
144        .append("\"src\":\"").append(escape(src)).append("\",")
145        .append("\"dst\":\"").append(escape(dst)).append("\",")
146        .append("\"first_line\":\"").append(escape(firstLine)).append("\",")
147        .append("\"headers_blob\":\"").append(blobName).append("\",")
148        .append("\"headers_off\":").append(headersOffset).append(',')
149        .append("\"headers_len\":").append(headersLength).append(',')
150        .append("\"body_blob\":\"").append(blobName).append("\",")
151        .append("\"body_off\":").append(bodyDiskOffset).append(',')
152        .append("\"body_len\":").append(bodyLength)
153        .append('}');
154
155    index.write(json.toString());
156    index.newLine();
157    index.flush();
158    blob.flush(false);
159  }
160
161  private static int findHeadersEnd(byte[] data) {
162    for (int i = 0; data != null && i + 3 < data.length; i++) {
163      if (data[i] == '\r' && data[i + 1] == '\n' && data[i + 2] == '\r' && data[i + 3] == '\n') {
164        return i + 4;
165      }
166    }
167    return -1;
168  }
169
170  private static String endpoint(FiveTuple flow, boolean fromClient) {
171    return fromClient ? flow.srcIp() + ':' + flow.srcPort() : flow.dstIp() + ':' + flow.dstPort();
172  }
173
174  private static String extractFirstLine(byte[] data, int limit) {
175    if (data == null || data.length == 0) {
176      return "";
177    }
178    int end = Math.min(limit, data.length);
179    for (int i = 0; i + 1 < end; i++) {
180      if (data[i] == '\r' && data[i + 1] == '\n') {
181        return new String(data, 0, i, StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1).trim();
182      }
183    }
184    return new String(data, 0, end, StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1).trim();
185  }
186
187  private static String escape(String value) {
188    if (value == null || value.isEmpty()) {
189      return "";
190    }
191    StringBuilder out = new StringBuilder(value.length() + 8);
192    for (int i = 0; i < value.length(); i++) {
193      char c = value.charAt(i);
194      switch (c) {
195        case '"', '\\' -> out.append('\\').append(c);
196        case '\n' -> out.append("\\n");
197        case '\r' -> out.append("\\r");
198        case '\t' -> out.append("\\t");
199        default -> {
200          if (c < 0x20) {
201            out.append(' ');
202          } else {
203            out.append(c);
204          }
205        }
206      }
207    }
208    return out.toString();
209  }
210
211  /**
212   * Flushes and closes blob/index streams and the fallback sink.
213   *
214   * @throws Exception if closing the fallback fails
215   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
216   */
217  @Override
218  public synchronized void close() throws Exception {
219    try {
220      index.flush();
221    } finally {
222      try {
223        index.close();
224      } finally {
225        blob.close();
226        if (fallback != null) {
227          fallback.close();
228        }
229      }
230    }
231  }
232}
